## Fix DM Revocation

Fixed the "DM cannot be revoked" issue - the client was blocking
DM revocation with a warning toast instead of sending the revoke
message to the server.

## Changes
- Updated `handleToggleDM` to send `revoke-dm` message (apps/client/src/ui/App.tsx:1078-1090)
- Added confirmation dialog before revoking DM status
- Shows success toast after revocation
- Removed blocking warning message

## Server Support
The server already had full support for DM revocation:
- `revoke-dm` message type defined (packages/shared/src/index.ts)
- Handler implemented (apps/server/src/ws/connectionHandler.ts:181-184)
- Validation in place (apps/server/src/middleware/validation.ts:755)

## Use Case
Enables collaborative DM handoff:
1. Active DM clicks "Exit DM" 
2. Confirms revocation in dialog
3. Another player can elevate to DM with password
4. Original DM can re-elevate later if needed
